org.ejml.alg.dense.linsol
Interface LinearSolver

All Known Subinterfaces:
AdjustableLinearSolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjLinearSolverQr, GaussJordan, GaussJordanNoPivot, LinearSolverAbstract, LinearSolverChol, LinearSolverCholLDL, LinearSolverLu, LinearSolverLuBase, LinearSolverLuKJI, LinearSolverQr, LinearSolverQrHouse, LinearSolverQrHouseCol, LinearSolverSvd, SolvePseudoInverse
public interface LinearSolver

Computes solutions for systems that have the form:
A*X = B.
where A ∈ ℜ m × n, X ∈ ℜ n × p, B ∈ ℜ m × p, and m ≥ n.

If m = n then there is an exact solution, if m > n then it is an over determined system and a best fit in the least-squares sense solution is found instead. If no solution can be found for A then false is returned by setA(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F).

A function is provided for computing the inverse of A. This can be accomplished by using the solve function also, but sometimes there are faster ways to compute the inverse.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Method Summary
 DenseMatrix64F getA()
          Returns a reference to the matrix A that it is processing.
 void invert(DenseMatrix64F A_inv)
          Computes the inverse of A matrix and writes the results to the provided matrix.
 boolean setA(DenseMatrix64F A)
          Specifies the A matrix in the linear equation.
 void solve(DenseMatrix64F B, DenseMatrix64F X)
           Solves for X in the linear system, AX=B.
 

Method Detail

getA

DenseMatrix64F getA()
Returns a reference to the matrix A that it is processing.

Returns:
Matrix A.

setA

boolean setA(DenseMatrix64F A)
Specifies the A matrix in the linear equation. A reference is saved internally but the matrix is not modified. This reference is discarded the next time this function is called.

Parameters:
A - The A matrix in the linear equation. Not modified. Reference saved.
Returns:
true if it can be processed.

solve

void solve(DenseMatrix64F B,
           DenseMatrix64F X)

Solves for X in the linear system, AX=B.

In some implementations B and X can be the same instance of a variable.

Parameters:
B - A matrix ℜ m × p. Not modified.
X - A matrix ℜ n × p, where the solution is written to. Modified.

invert

void invert(DenseMatrix64F A_inv)
Computes the inverse of A matrix and writes the results to the provided matrix.

Parameters:
A_inv - Where the inverted matrix is writen to. Modified.
